official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the acceleration of wellhead natural gas prices.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission should take no action to accelerate the decontrol of wellhead natural gas prices.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives with respect to the acceleration of wellhead natural gas prices.
